LanguageData.DecompressionDesc: A door has blown out and decompressed the room
LanguageData.digicysanddesc: Dig martian sand which has a high enough ice crystal content to extract water.
LanguageData.mustbeicysand: Terrain must be sand containing moisture
LanguageData.digsanddesc: Dig martian sand to make soil
LanguageData.coveredsand: Panels are covered in martian dust
LanguageData.suito2lowDesc: An EVA suit is critically low on o2, get to a compressed room now!
LanguageData.roomO2lowDesc: The O2 level in this room is dangerously low
LanguageData.roomCO2highDesc: The CO2 level in this room is dangerously high
LanguageData.roomPressureLowDesc: The pressure level in this room is dangerously low
LanguageData.Alert_WantsSleepEVADesc: This person needs rest but is wearing an EVA suit, either end their EVA or have them enter a lander to sleep.
LanguageData.Alert_IntegrityDesc: A compartment in your hab has low integrity, reinforce the structure to prevent catastrophic failure
LanguageData.Alert_UmbilicalDesc: A lander is not connected to an umbilical, place a lander umbilical box near it to connect the power and refueling systems to your base
